title: Home Index File Content Chunk Document
description: Schema describing file content chunk documents stored in the Meilisearch "file_chunks" index.

file_id.description: ID of the parent file document

module.description: Name of the module that produced the chunk

index.description: Position of the chunk within the module's context

start.description: Optional start offset of the chunk in the source (float)

end.description: Optional end offset of the chunk in the source (float)

_vector.description: Sentence embedding vector for semantic search
